brief_title: A Study to Evaluate an Investigational Drug in Patients With Mixed Hyperlipidemia (0653A-071)(COMPLETED)
brief_summary: The purpose of this study is to assess the cholesterol lowering effects of an investigational drug in patients with mixed hyperlipidemia (high cholesterol and high triglycerides).
criteria: Inclusion Criteria: - Men and women 18-79 years of age with high cholesterol and high triglycerides. Exclusion Criteria: - Individuals who do not meet specific cholesterol or triglyceride levels as required by the study.
